00114 template<class IM_TYPE, class ST_TYPE>
00115 class XVSSDStepper {
00116 
00117  protected:
00118 
00119   XVImageScalar<float> target, X, Y, Dx, Dy;
00120   XVMatrix inverse_model;
00121   XVMatrix forward_model;
00122   XVColVector diff_intensity ;
00123 
00124   XVSize size;
00125 
00126  public:
00127 
00128   typedef ST_TYPE STATE_TYPE;
00129   typedef IM_TYPE IMAGE_TYPE;
00130 
00131   typedef typename IM_TYPE::PIXELTYPE PIXEL_TYPE;
00132 
00133   typedef XVStatePair<STATE_TYPE, double> ResultPair;
00134 
00135   XVSSDStepper(){}
00136 
00137   XVSSDStepper(const IM_TYPE & template_in );
00138 
00139   XVSSDStepper(const XVSSDStepper<IM_TYPE, ST_TYPE> & st) 
00140     : target(st.target), X(st.X), Y(st.Y), Dx(st.Dx), Dy(st.Dy),
00141       inverse_model(st.inverse_model), 
00142       forward_model(st.forward_model), 
00143       diff_intensity(st.diff_intensity),
00144       size(st.size) {}
00145 
00146   XVSize getSize() const { return size; };
00147   
00148   virtual void offlineInit() = 0;
00149 
00150   virtual ResultPair step( const XVImageScalar<float> &, const ST_TYPE &) = 0;
00151 
00152   virtual XVImageScalar<float> warp(const IM_TYPE &, const ST_TYPE &) = 0;  
00153 };

00155 template <class IM_TYPE>
00156 class XVTransStepper : public XVSSDStepper<IM_TYPE, XVTransState > {
00157  protected:
00158   using XVSSDStepper<IM_TYPE,XVTransState>::target ;
00159   using XVSSDStepper<IM_TYPE,XVTransState>::X ;
00160   using XVSSDStepper<IM_TYPE,XVTransState>::Y ;
00161   using XVSSDStepper<IM_TYPE,XVTransState>::Dx ;
00162   using XVSSDStepper<IM_TYPE,XVTransState>::Dy ;
00163   using XVSSDStepper<IM_TYPE,XVTransState>::inverse_model ;
00164   using XVSSDStepper<IM_TYPE,XVTransState>::forward_model ;
00165   using XVSSDStepper<IM_TYPE,XVTransState>::diff_intensity ;
00166   using XVSSDStepper<IM_TYPE,XVTransState>::size ;
00167 
00168  public:
00169 
00170   typedef typename XVSSDStepper<IM_TYPE,XVTransState>::ResultPair ResultPair ;
00171 
00172   XVTransStepper() : XVSSDStepper<IM_TYPE, XVTransState >() {}
00173   XVTransStepper(const IM_TYPE & tmpl) 
00174     : XVSSDStepper<IM_TYPE, XVTransState >(tmpl) {}
00175 
00176   virtual void offlineInit();
00177   virtual ResultPair step(const XVImageScalar<float> &, const XVTransState &);
00178   virtual XVImageScalar<float> warp(const IM_TYPE &, const XVTransState &);
00179 };

00253 template <class STEPPER_TYPE>
00254 class XVPyramidStepper {
00255  protected:
00256   typedef typename STEPPER_TYPE::STATE_TYPE ST_TYPE ;
00257   typedef typename STEPPER_TYPE::IMAGE_TYPE IM_TYPE ;
00258 
00259   typedef std::vector<STEPPER_TYPE> STEPPER_SET ;
00260 
00261   double scale_factor ;
00262   STEPPER_SET steppers ;
00263 
00264   IM_TYPE savedImage ;
00265 
00266   virtual XVImageScalar<float> upperLayer( const XVImageScalar<float>& lower );
00267 
00268  public:
00269 
00270   typedef ST_TYPE STATE_TYPE;
00271   typedef IM_TYPE IMAGE_TYPE;
00272 
00273   typedef typename IM_TYPE::PIXELTYPE PIXEL_TYPE;
00274 
00275   typedef XVStatePair<STATE_TYPE, double> ResultPair;
00276 
00277   XVPyramidStepper(){}
00278 
00279   XVPyramidStepper( const IM_TYPE & template_in, double scale = .5,
00280               int levels = 2 );
00281 
00282   virtual XVSize getSize() const { return steppers[0].getSize(); };
00283   
00284   virtual void offlineInit() ;
00285 
00286   virtual ResultPair step( const XVImageScalar<float> &, const ST_TYPE &) ;
00287 
00288   virtual XVImageScalar<float> warp(const IM_TYPE &, const ST_TYPE &) ;  
00289 };

00303 template <class IM_TYPE, class STEPPER_TYPE>
00304 class XVSSD : public XVFeature<IM_TYPE, XVImageScalar<float>,
00305                                XVStatePair<typename STEPPER_TYPE::STATE_TYPE, 
00306                                            double> > {
00307 protected:
00308   using XVFeature<IM_TYPE, XVImageScalar<float>,
00309     XVStatePair<typename STEPPER_TYPE::STATE_TYPE,double> >::prevState ;
00310   using XVFeature<IM_TYPE, XVImageScalar<float>,
00311     XVStatePair<typename STEPPER_TYPE::STATE_TYPE,double> >::currentState ;
00312   using XVFeature<IM_TYPE, XVImageScalar<float>,
00313     XVStatePair<typename STEPPER_TYPE::STATE_TYPE,double> >::warped ;
00314   using XVFeature<IM_TYPE, XVImageScalar<float>,
00315     XVStatePair<typename STEPPER_TYPE::STATE_TYPE,double> >::warpUpdated ;
00316 
00317 protected:
00318 
00319   STEPPER_TYPE Stepper;
00320 
00321 public:
00322 
00323   typedef IM_TYPE IMAGE_TYPE;
00324   typedef typename STEPPER_TYPE::STATE_TYPE STATE_TYPE;
00325   typedef XVStatePair<STATE_TYPE, double > SP;
00326   
00327   XVSSD() {}
00328   XVSSD(const STATE_TYPE & pos_in,
00329      const IM_TYPE & tmpl_in) 
00330     : XVFeature<IM_TYPE, XVImageScalar<float>, SP >(SP(pos_in, 0.0)), Stepper(tmpl_in) {};
00331 
00332   virtual XVImageScalar<float> warp(const IM_TYPE &);
00333   virtual const SP & step(const IM_TYPE &);
00334   virtual const SP & step(const IM_TYPE & im, const SP & st)
00335     { return XVFeature<IM_TYPE, XVImageScalar<float>, SP>::step( im, st ); }
00336   virtual void show(XVDrawable &,float scale=1.0);
00337   virtual const SP & interactiveInit(XVInteractive &, const IM_TYPE &);
00338   virtual const SP & interactiveInit(XVInteractive &, XVSize &, const IM_TYPE &);
00339   virtual void setStepper( const STEPPER_TYPE& stepper_in );
00340 };
